Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)
CAN: The student can draw a detailed and clear picture showing two people on either end of the string telephone, each speaking or listening into a cup.
The student can accurately illustrate the string telephone device using string and cups, demonstrating the setup effectively.
The student can depict sound traveling through the string by using arrows or lines to show the direction of sound waves.
The student can show the device set up using only the tools and materials specified, like string and cups.
The student can indicate clearly that the device is used for sending and receiving information by labeling or visual cues (e.g., sound waves entering/exiting cup).
The student can effectively demonstrate in the drawing how using the string telephone helps people communicate over a distance.
CANNOT: The student may sometimes omit minor details such as labeling every component (e.g., missing label on one of the cups) but demonstrates overall understanding.
The student may occasionally show redundancy in representation, like drawing more lines than necessary to indicate sound travel, without causing misunderstanding.
